name: astroevent-landing-page
title: AstroEvent Landing Page
desc: AstroEvent, is a minimal open-source Event Website Template built using Astro 3.0 (View Transitions) and TailwindCSS.
article:
An elegant and responsive event landing page template built using Astro, Tailwind CSS, and View Transitions API. This template is perfect for showcasing events, concerts, festivals, and more with a modern and visually appealing design.

Features

  • Astro Integration: Utilizes Astro's static site generation capabilities for fast and optimized web performance.
  • View Transitions: Smooth and seamless transitions between pages for an enhanced user experience.
  • Tailwind CSS: Styled with Tailwind CSS for a clean, responsive, and highly customizable design.
  • Responsive Design: Fully responsive and mobile-friendly layout.
  • Dynamic Content: Easy to update and manage content for events, including images, dates, and descriptions.

Sections Included

  • Hero Section: A captivating banner with a headline and a call-to-action button.
  • Event Highlights: Showcase key event highlights with images and descriptions.
  • Blog Post Section: Display blog posts or event recaps with images, titles, and short descriptions.
  • Event Schedule: List of upcoming events with dates, times, and locations.

github.name: astrojs-event-template
github.description: Event Website Template built with Astro View Transitions and TailwindCSS
